fields.role: Denies enemy movement with gas traps and controls interior spaces; excels at holding positions and resetting fights.
fields.lead_when: When you can secure a building or choke point and deploy Nox Gas traps.
fields.follow_when: When teammates need safe rotation through your gas coverage.
fields.disengage_when: When you are forced out of gas or enemies breach without cover.

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold buildings; commit only when gas advantage exists.

passive.leverage_when: Fighting inside your own Nox gas for vision advantage.
passive.do_not_rely_on: Passive does not work in enemy gas.

ultimate.do_not_use_when: In open fields where gas dissipates quickly.
ultimate.abort_conditions: Ring forces you into open area before gas can be effective.

fight_flow.start: Pre‑trap building, wait for enemies to enter.
fight_flow.mid_fight: Fight inside gas, maintain vision and damage advantage; refresh traps.
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult to block pursuit and trap escape routes.

rotations.early_game: Secure interior building, lay initial traps.
rotations.mid_game: Rotate to new choke points, keep gas coverage.
rotations.late_game: Use ultimate to deny final‑ring pushes and reset.
rotations.bad_rotation: Rotating without a secondary position secured and trapped.

ideal_primary.reason: Reliable mid‑range damage while holding gas.

common_mistakes: Trapping too late after the push has started
Using Nox Gas Grenade in open areas where it dissipates quickly
fields.mental_rule: If you lack gas advantage → fall back and re‑trap.
